item.title: Get them into peoples hands!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Get them in people's hands. Make another concious push towards newstand sales and give them to doctors and barbers. My corner store sold me Justice League when I was 6 years old, that's why I like comics. But every comic on the newstand needs to be great. If the Justice League hadn't been starting the Giffen-Dematties era then I doubt I'd still be reading comics. Giffen-Dematties JLA's where the comics that had me hooked until I was old enough to go to specialty stores. (Link courtesy of Mae Mai)
